meta.title: OU Campus

div.p: OU Campus requires Javascript to provide the best possible user experience. Please enable Javascript in your browser settings.

form.name: insights-configuration-form

div.div:
Font sizes up to 999.9999 are supported.
Fractional sizes can have up to four digits after the decimal point.

button.title: Keep Synced with Main Page List

div.style: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100%;
color: red; font: normal 14px Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

div.p: Select the tag that all tags will be merged into. All other tags will automatically be updated to the new tag value on existing content and then disabled.
